name: Guanchu Wang
content: Guanchu Wang Home Publications Research Demo Teaching and Mentoring Guanchu (Gary) Wang Assistant Professor Department of Computer Science University of North Carolina at Charlotte Address: 9201 University City Blvd, Charlotte, NC 28223 Email: [CV] [Linkedin] [Google Scholar] [DBLP] [ResearchGate] [Paper with code] About me I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science at University of North Carolina at Charlotte. I earned my Ph.D. in Computer Science from Rice University in 2025, under the guidance of Dr. Xia Hu and Dr. Vladimir Braverman. My research focuses on Trustworthy AI, with a particular emphasis on the explainability, reliability, and safety of foundation models. In addition, I collaborate closely with health informaticians at UTHealth and Baylor College of Medicine, leveraging AI to address critical challenges in healthcare. I'm actively looking for self-motivated PhD students and research interns. If you are interested, please email your CV to . Credits to all co-authors! See [Paper]. 05/2025: Our paper MAIN-RAG: Multi-Agent Filtering Retrieval-Augmented Generation. is accepted by ACL 2025! Credits to all co-authors!
